languages.text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).
languages.original_text: Если в текущем комплекте оружия персонажа есть хотя бы один пистолет, то персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в начале боя. Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж может совершить по одной (любой) атаке с использованием каждого пистолета в текущем комплекте оружия.

traits.locale_text: If the character has at least one pistol in the current weapon set, at the start of combat they gain an extra turn. During this extra turn the character can make only one attack with each pistol of their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an extra turn at the start of combat. During this extra turn, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

languages.text: Si el personaje tiene al menos una pistola en su conjunto de armas actual, obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} al principio del combate. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el personaje solo puede lanzar un ataque con cada pistola de su conjunto de armas actual (puede ser cualquier ataque concedido por la pistola).
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: Si el personaje tiene al menos una pistola en su conjunto de armas actual, obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} al principio del combate. Durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el personaje solo puede lanzar un ataque con cada pistola de su conjunto de armas actual (puede ser cualquier ataque concedido por la pistola).

languages.text: このキャラクターが現在の武器セットにピストルを1個以上持っている場合、戦闘開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。この追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、このキャラクターは現在の武器セット内のピストル1個につき1回攻撃を行うことができる（攻撃はすべてピストルによるもの）
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが現在の武器セットにピストルを1個以上持っている場合、戦闘開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。この追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、このキャラクターは現在の武器セット内のピストル1個につき1回攻撃を行うことができる（攻撃はすべてピストルによるもの）

languages.text: 如果角色当前的武器中至少装备了一把手枪，则会在战斗开始时获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此次额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，角色只能使用当前武器套装中的每把手枪进行一次攻击（可以使用手枪的任意攻击方式）。
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: 如果角色当前的武器中至少装备了一把手枪，则会在战斗开始时获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此次额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，角色只能使用当前武器套装中的每把手枪进行一次攻击（可以使用手枪的任意攻击方式）。

languages.text: Hat der Charakter mindestens eine Pistole in seinem aktuellen Waffenset, erhält er zu Beginn des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}. Während dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} kann der Charakter nur einen Angriff mit jeder Pistole in seinem aktuellen Waffenset ausführen (einen beliebigen Angriff, der von der Pistole gewährt wird).
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Charakter mindestens eine Pistole in seinem aktuellen Waffenset hat, erhält er zu Beginn des Kampfes eine {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Extra-Runde{/g}. Während dieser Extra-{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} kann der Charakter nur einen Angriff mit jeder Pistole in seinem aktuellen Waffenset ausführen (einen beliebigen Angriff, der von der Pistole gewährt wird).

languages.text: Si le personnage possède au moins un pistolet dans son ensemble d'armes actuel, il gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} au début du combat. Pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire, il ne peut mener qu'une seule attaque avec chaque pistolet de son ensemble d'armes actuel (n'importe quelle attaque conférée par le pistolet).
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: Si le personnage possède au moins un pistolet dans son ensemble d'armes actuel, il gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} au début du combat. Pendant ce {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire, il ne peut mener qu'une seule attaque avec chaque pistolet de son ensemble d'armes actuel (n'importe quelle attaque conférée par le pistolet).

languages.text: Если в текущем комплекте оружия персонажа есть хотя бы один пистолет, то персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в начале боя. Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж может совершить по одной (любой) атаке с использованием каждого пистолета в текущем комплекте оружия.
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).

traits.locale_text: Если в текущем наборе оружия персонажа есть хотя бы один пистолет, то персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в начале боя. Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж может совершить по одной (любой) атаке с использованием каждого пистолета в текущем наборе оружия.

Если в текущем наборе оружия персонажа есть хотя бы один пистолет, то персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} в начале боя. Во время этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж может совершить по одной (любой) атаке с использованием каждого пистолета в текущем наборе оружия.

languages.text: Karakterin o anki silah setinde en az bir tabanca varsa karakter, çatışmanın başında bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır. Karakter, bu ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} esnasında o anki silah setindeki her tabancayla yalnızca bir saldırı gerçekleştirebilir (tabancayla yapılan herhangi bir saldırı).
languages.original_text: If the character has at least one pistol in their current weapon set, they gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} at the start of combat. During this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the character can make only one attack with each pistol in their current weapon set (any attack granted by the pistol).
